DataElement.preferredName: Sex Behavior Quality of Life Erection Sufficient Penetration Past Integer::6 Month Assessment Score
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric entry that describes a man's assessment of how often his erections were sufficient for penetration.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Sex Behavior Quality of Life Erection Sufficient Penetration Past Integer::6 Month Assessment
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related the evaluation of the occurrence of an erection, the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male, was hard enough to allow penetration during physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else as part of the subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life._Before the present time._A number with no fractional part.::6_One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Sexual behavior is a form of physical intimacy that can be directed to reproduction (one possible goal of sexual intercourse) and/or to enjoying the body of someone else; activities associated with sexual intercourse. (from Wikipedia):The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life.  The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Concepts.definition: Behaviors involved with sexual arousal and/or intercourse.

The subjective measurement of an individual's sense of well-being and ability to enjoy life. The concept holds varying meanings for different people and may evolve over time. For some individuals it implies autonomy, empowerment, capability, and choice; for others, security, social integration, or freedom from stress or illness.

Property.preferredName: Erection Sufficient Penetration Past Integer::6 Month Assessment
Property.preferredDefinition: Erection is the hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.:Meeting a quantitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation. New NCI Definition: Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.:Penetration; the act of entering into or through something.:Past; before the present time.:A number with no fractional part.::6:One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar.  It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.:The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

Concepts.definition: The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male.
Meeting a quantitative or qualitative measure necessary for a requirement; enough to meet the needs of a situation.
The act of entering into or through something.
A number with no fractional part, including the negative and positive numbers as well as zero.
One of the 12 divisions of a year as determined by a calendar. It corresponds to the unit of time of approximately to one cycle of the moon's phases, about 30 days or 4 weeks.
The final result of a determination of the value, significance, or extent of.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: information on quality of patient life and ability to function

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The hardening, enlarging and rising of the penis which often occurs in the sexually aroused male._The act of entering into or through something._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened always or almost always.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened always or almost always.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: Most times (much more than half the time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: Most times (much more than half the time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happens or happened most of the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

Concepts.definition: From time to time, but not continually or always.

PermissibleValues.valueDescription: A few times (much less than half the time)

ValueMeaning.preferredName: A few times (much less than half the time)
ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened less than half the time.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened less than half the time.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: A response indicating that something happened never or almost never.

Concepts.definition: A response indicating that something happened never or almost never.

ReferenceDocuments.name: When you had erections with s
ReferenceDocuments.description: When you had erections with sexual stimulation, how often were your erections hard enough for penetration (entering your partner)?

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated for NCI CCR trial.  The SHIM is a tool to assess ED (Erectile Dysfunction) in males, and is based on a past six months assessment.
